original_text: But some teachers of God's Law were sitting there. They thought about the words that Jesus had spoken to the man.
korean_text: 어떤 서기관들이 거기 앉아서 마음에 생각하기를

sentences.original_text: But some teachers of God's Law were sitting there.
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 하나님의 율법을 가르치는 몇몇 교사들이 그곳에 앉아 있었습니다.

sentences.original_text: that Jesus had spoken to the man.
